knimeNode.name: Similar fragments
knimeNode.shortDescription: Find similar fragments to queries based on the Kripo fingerprint similarity matrix.

fullDescription.intro: Find similar fragments bound to similar subpockets as the subpocket associated with the query fragment based on the fingerprint similarity matrix.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the Kripo fragment identifiers

Location of Kripo similarity matrix, can be the base url of kripodb webservice or a local file.
Available datasets:
Protein Data Bank, similarity matrix is too big to ship, use the public webservice at http://3d-e-chem.vu-compmedchem.nl/kripodb
Tiny example dataset, download from here , in 3D-e-Chem VM available at '/data/kripo/tiny/similarities.h5'
GPCR, All fragments based on GPCR proteins compared with all proteins in PDB, download from here , in 3D-e-Chem VM available at '/data/kripo/gpcr/kripo.gpcr.h5'
When combining this node with other Kripo nodes make sure the files are from the same dataset.
Cutoff, scores below cutoff are discarded.
Maximum number of hits for each query.

ports.outPort: Table with similar Kripo identifiers and scores vs the input table.
